message.body: Anais Mitchell went to Middlebury and one of the professors just mentioned her in a Theatre Department video!
I'm applying early decision. Do you think that's the right choice?
If you feel sure that you want to go there. I think its an amazing place

Me too! I picked middlebury because I thought I'd have the best chance of getting in there but I like it just as much (but in different ways) as I do some of the others that are harder to get into. Like what if I get into Middlebury and have to go, but I would have been better suited for Vassar?
Also guess what! I'm going to sing a solo with uto and sons of pitch at the Philly fringe!
Im not sure what to tell you about early decision....all i know is that midd wont let you down
Ok thanks, I think I'll stick with it
